attributes.action: recognise Endometriosis  as a disablity and commit funds for disability  living allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WOMEN WHO SUFFER FROM ENDOMETRIOSIS LIVE IN SEVERE PAIN ALL DAY EVERY DAY BUT NO ONE EVER THINKS THEY ARE DISABLED IN ANY WAY BUT IF YOU LIVE WITH A SUFFERER YOU WOULD SEE WHO DISABLIATING IT REALY IS BUT THE GOVERMENT WILL NOT GIVE ANY HELP IN WAY OF DISABILTY BENEFITS AND WE SHOULD ALL HELP TO EASE THE SUFFERING.THANK YOU

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FemaleHealth/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
